QuestData.Title: Clan Nokhud
QuestData.Description:
<As Sansok Khan signs, Okir vocalizes for her.>
Clan Nokhud is the newest to rise to power. Their late khan, Jhakan, raised a mighty army to seize territory from their predecessors. Such is the way of our people.
While Jhakan had earned his respect, his son has not. Balakar killed his father and took control of the clan. They have grown ever more insular since. But to know the Maruuk, you must know them.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Scout Tomul by the Nokhud encampment.
QuestData.RewardText: I have the great unpleasantness of introducing you to Bahir, one of Balakar Khan's thugs.
